Issue.creator: jeffgarratt
Issue.summary: Use of "None" as field name causes compiler error in Scala (None is keyword).
Issue.description: The ChaincodeSource message in protos/peer/lifecycle/lifecycle.proto has a field name of "None", which is a keyword in Scala. I spoke with ~jyellick and he suggested "Unavailable". He also stated that this should NOT cause ABI break.
